module: Module-level comment: This is the 'topaudio' module, a controller for an audio processing system. It uses a network of interconnected sub-modules such as audio effects ('overdrive', 'Delay', 'ECHO', 'REVERB'), gain control ('ganancia'), analog-digital converters ('adc', 'dac'), controller ('controlador') and the rotary encoder ('rot_enc'). The module uses input signals from switches and a rotary encoder to control individual effects and uses SPI protocol for inter-module communication. The processed audio output is available on 'effect_OUT', with internal data on 'datosINTERNO'.
